sentences.en: A walker fell 80ft from a rocky pinnacle.
sentences.cn: 一位徒步者从一块80英尺高的尖锥形岩石上摔了下来。

sentences.en: Castle Peak Pinnacle here, blue waves, rugged rock formations, JourneyAmazing Caves.
sentences.cn: 这里青山叠翠,碧波荡漾, 怪石嶙峋, 别有洞天.

sentences.en: Even among seasoned mountaineers Pinnacle Ridge is considered quite a tough proposition.
sentences.cn: 即使在经验丰富的登山者中，平纳克尔峰也被认为是很难攀登的。

sentences.en: He looked up him with veneration on the old imaginary pinnacle.
sentences.cn: 他对这个自以为高人一等的老绅士推崇备至.

sentences.en: John Major has reached the pinnacle of British politics.
sentences.cn: 约翰·梅杰已攀上了英国政界的顶峰。

sentences.en: Now he is at the very pinnacle of his career.
sentences.cn: 现在他正值一生中的顶峰时期.

sentences.en: One day people will unswervingly boarded ideal and the pinnacle of success.
sentences.cn: 坚持不懈的人终有一天会登上理想与成功的顶峰.

sentences.en: Our species has reached its biological pinnacle and is no longer capable of changing.
sentences.cn: 我们这个物种已经达到了生物进化的巅峰,不可能再有变化了.

sentences.en: She was still a screen goddess at the pinnacle of her career.
sentences.cn: 她仍然是一位处于事业巅峰期的银幕女神。

sentences.en: She was still at the pinnacle of her career.
sentences.cn: 她依然处在事业的巅峰时期。

sentences.en: Shicheng Ridge sunrise: Shicheng River Ridge is the pinnacle of Pennisetum.
sentences.cn: 石城岭观日出: 石城岭是白草畔的顶峰.

sentences.en: Surrounding hills, Cengluan Pinnacle, winding flow like a river during Piaodai longitudinal.
sentences.cn: 四周群山环抱, 层峦叠翠, 蜿蜒曲折的流溪河像一条飘带纵贯其间.

sentences.en: The siren also reaches its pinnacle and then suddenly goes off.
sentences.cn: 警报声达到极限,然后嘎然而止.

sentences.en: The world is facing not peak oil, but a pinnacle of nationalism.
sentences.cn: 世界所面临的不是“峰值石油”, 而是民族主义的顶峰.

sentences.en: Twenty-five years ago, to the day, England reached the sport's pinnacle by winning the World Cup.
sentences.cn: 恰好是在25年前的今天，英格兰队在世界杯上夺冠，到达了足球运动的巅峰。

trans.tran_cn: 顶峰，顶点，尖顶，[建]（哥德式建筑的）小尖塔
trans.tran_en: a pointed stone decoration, like a small tower, on a building such as a church or castle

trans.tran_cn: 造小尖塔；置于尖顶上；置于高处
